r.d: The popular Template system from PHPLIB ported to PEAR. It has some features that can't be found currently in the original version like fallback paths. It has minor improvements and cleanup in the code as well as some speed improvements.
r.n: - Fix bug #12243: PEAR_Errors not returned from halt() - Add new "return" haltOnError level - Respect haltOnError settings - Implement request #15993: Add setIllegals() method for variable names
